languages.text: {n}Маражай окидывает толпу хищным взглядом, от которого шепчущие испуганно замолкают и вжимаются в толпу.{/n} "Скот так сильно рвется на бойню. Видимо, их хозяева недостаточно жестоки — возможно, пора это исправить".

{n}Marazhai sweeps the crowd with a predatory gaze, silencing the whispers and driving the fearful deeper into the throng.{/n} "Cattle so eager for the slaughter. Their masters show too little cruelty — perhaps it is time to remedy that."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай окидывает толпу хищным взглядом, от которого шепчущие испуганно замолкают и вжимаются в толпу.{/n} "Скот так сильно рвется на бойню. Видимо, их хозяева недостаточно жестоки — возможно, пора это исправить".

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは獲物を狙う目で群衆を見渡し、ざわめきを凍りつかせ、怯えた連中をさらに奥へ追い込む。{/n} 「屠られるのを待ってる家畜ども。飼い主どもは残酷さが足りないな。そろそろ直してやるか」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sweeps the crowd with a predatory gaze, silencing the whispers and driving the fearful deeper into the throng.{/n} "Cattle so eager for the slaughter. Their masters show too little cruelty — perhaps it is time to remedy that."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラーザイは獲物を狙う目で群衆を見渡し、ざわめきを凍りつかせ、怯えた連中をさらに奥へ追い込む。{/n} 「屠られるのを待ってる家畜ども。飼い主どもは残酷さが足りないな。そろそろ直してやるか。」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai recorre el gentío con una mirada rapaz que acalla los murmullos y hace que los más temerosos se cohíban entre la muchedumbre.{/n} «Son como el ganado que espera con ansia ser conducido al matadero. Sus amos no les dispensan la crueldad necesaria; va siendo hora de ponerle remedio».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sweeps the crowd with a predatory gaze, silencing the whispers and driving the fearful deeper into the throng.{/n} "Cattle so eager for the slaughter. Their masters show too little cruelty — perhaps it is time to remedy that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai recorre el gentío con una mirada rapaz que acalla los murmullos y hace que los más temerosos se cohíban entre la muchedumbre.{/n} «Son como el ganado que espera con ansia ser conducido al matadero. Sus amos no les dispensan la crueldad necesaria; va siendo hora de ponerle remedio».

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋以掠食者的目光扫视着人群。所有窃窃私语都消失了，恐惧在人群之中不断蔓延。{/n}“畜群竟然如此渴望被人屠宰。它们的主人太缺乏残忍，或许是时候改正这个错误了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sweeps the crowd with a predatory gaze, silencing the whispers and driving the fearful deeper into the throng.{/n} "Cattle so eager for the slaughter. Their masters show too little cruelty — perhaps it is time to remedy that."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋以掠食者的目光扫视着人群。所有窃窃私语都消失了，恐惧在人群之中不断蔓延。{/n}“畜群竟然如此渴望被人屠宰。它们的主人太缺乏残忍，或许是时候改正这个错误了。”

languages.text: {n}Als Marazhai seinen raubtierhaften Blick über die Menge schweifen lässt, verstummt das Flüstern und die Ängstlichen ziehen sich tiefer in die Menge zurück.{/n} "Wie Schafe vor der Schlachtbank. Ihre Meister sind nicht grausam genug ... vielleicht wird es Zeit, das zu ändern."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sweeps the crowd with a predatory gaze, silencing the whispers and driving the fearful deeper into the throng.{/n} "Cattle so eager for the slaughter. Their masters show too little cruelty — perhaps it is time to remedy that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Marazhai seinen raubtierhaften Blick über die Menge schweifen lässt, verstummt das Flüstern und die Ängstlichen ziehen sich tiefer in die Menge zurück.{/n} "Wie Schafe vor der Schlachtbank. Ihre Meister sind nicht grausam genug ... vielleicht wird es Zeit, das zu ändern."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai balaie l'assistance d'un regard prédateur, faisant taire les murmures et reculer les moins téméraires.{/n} « Un bétail si facilement disposé à partir à l'abattoir. Leurs maîtres sont bien trop cléments ; il serait peut-être temps de remédier à ce problème. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sweeps the crowd with a predatory gaze, silencing the whispers and driving the fearful deeper into the throng.{/n} "Cattle so eager for the slaughter. Their masters show too little cruelty — perhaps it is time to remedy that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai balaie l'assistance d'un regard prédateur, faisant taire les murmures et reculer les moins téméraires.{/n} « Un bétail si facilement disposé à partir à l'abattoir. Leurs maîtres sont bien trop cléments ; il serait peut-être temps de remédier à ce problème. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, yırtıcı bir bakışla kalabalığı süzerek fısıltıları kesiyor ve korkakları kalabalığın iç kısımlarına itiyor.{/n} "Katledilmeye hevesli bir güruh. Efendileri çok az zulüm ediyor... Belki de bunu değiştirmenin zamanı gelmiştir."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sweeps the crowd with a predatory gaze, silencing the whispers and driving the fearful deeper into the throng.{/n} "Cattle so eager for the slaughter. Their masters show too little cruelty — perhaps it is time to remedy that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, yırtıcı bir bakışla kalabalığı süzerek fısıltıları kesiyor ve korkakları kalabalığın iç kısımlarına itiyor.{/n} "Katledilmeye hevesli bir güruh. Efendileri çok az zulüm ediyor... Belki de bunu değiştirmenin zamanı gelmiştir."
